gololang.concurrent.async

Interface Future

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssignedFuture

    public interface Future
    A future is an abstraction over the eventual result of a possibly asynchronous computation. This interface is intended to be used in conjunction with Promise. A future is a read-only view over a promise. Future objects are made composable in Golo through a set of augmentations: filter, map, etc. You should consult the "golodoc" of the gololang.Async module.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Future.Observer
      Simple interface for a future observer / callback.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object blockingGet()
      Blocking get, waiting until the future has been resolved.
      java.lang.Object get()
      Non-blocking get.
      boolean isFailed()
      Test whether the future has failed.
      boolean isResolved()
      Test whether the future has been resolved, that is, the future is either set or failed.
      Future onFail(Future.Observer observer)
      Registers a callback for when the future fails.
      Future onSet(Future.Observer observer)
      Registers a callback for when the future is set.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        java.lang.Object get()
        Non-blocking get.
        Returns:
        the future value, which may be null if it has not been resolved yet.

      • blockingGet

        java.lang.Object blockingGet()
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Blocking get, waiting until the future has been resolved.
        Returns:
        the future value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - when the current thread is being interrupted.

      • isResolved

        boolean isResolved()
        Test whether the future has been resolved, that is, the future is either set or failed.
        Returns:
        true if the future is resolved, false otherwise.

      • isFailed

        boolean isFailed()
        Test whether the future has failed.
        Returns:
        true if the future is resolved and failed, false otherwise.

      • onSet

        Future onSet(Future.Observer observer)
        Registers a callback for when the future is set. If the future has already been set, then it is executed immediately from the caller thread.
        Parameters:
        observer - the callback.
        Returns:
        this future object.

      • onFail

        Future onFail(Future.Observer observer)
        Registers a callback for when the future fails. If the future has already been failed, then it is executed immediately from the caller thread.
        Parameters:
        observer - the callback.
        Returns:
        this future object.
